definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Objective To observe the success rate of urethral catheterization by telescopic saccule urinary catheter.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察套管式球囊导尿管置管的成功率。

sentences.english: Methods Patients with neurosurgery operation were randomly distributed into 2 groups:pre-anesthesia catheterization group and post-anesthesia catheterization group.
sentences.chinese: 方法手术患者按麻醉前导尿和麻醉后导尿分为两组。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the nursing management of clean intermittent catheterization (CIC) of spinal cord injured (SCI) patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脊髓损伤患者清洁间歇导尿的护理管理。

sentences.english: Cystitis and urethritis are complications of prolonged use of indwelling catheters.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱炎和尿道炎是长期应用留置导尿管的并发症。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the urinary catheter should not be inserted before an examination of the rectum and genitalia .
sentences.chinese: 因此，在置导尿管前应先进行直肠及外生殖器的检查。

sentences.english: To adopt suggestion way in her mind to induce micturition .
sentences.chinese: 未成功者采用开塞露纳肛方法及行留置导尿术。

sentences.english: Intermission urethral catheterization was done according to residual urine.
sentences.chinese: 依据残余尿量多少进行间歇导尿。

sentences.english: Approach of preoperative detaining urethral catheterization opportunity of operative patients;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨舒泰在前列腺增生患者导尿中的应用效果。

sentences.english: You are going to have urine catheterization now.

definition: intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)
to give or have an acupuncture treatment
